section.name: Known usages of the timebars
section.p: This page will list known (and publishable) usages of the timebars component. Licencees will not be listed here. If you think, your project should be listed here drop a mail.

tr.td: Shahar Maoz et. al.: Using the timebars component for scientific visualization

Permeter is a research activity conducted by the Department of Business Information Systems, of the Carl-von-Ossietzky-University Oldenburg, Germany. The tool includes a project planning part with the timebars as the visualization component.
The Berlin RoofNet Simulator (Brn.Sim): Using the timebars component for scientific visualization (lots of intervals).
We did a quick port of the timebars that runs on android. This is behind the timalyzer.
